docs.text: How to Deploy on Github Pages 27 August 2023 create new repository on github push project to github with origin branch name use built in deploy to github page $ mkdocs gh-deploy if your account is free, make sure that your repository is public so you can use github pages for free too. on your repository, go to setting > Pages > Build and deployment > Branch > gh-pages > /root > save your site has deploy on <your github>/<your repository> for updating, you can add your update script / docs > commit and run again deploy to github pages mkdocs gh-deploy
docs.title: Home
